Is involved in a tense confrontation with threats and guns but attempts to de-escalate the situation through calm words.
Comforts Angela after a traumatic event, reassures her that he shot the attacker and not her.
Gives clear instructions to Frank regarding Angela's safety and what to do if Roy doesn't return.
Expresses regret and apologizes to Angela for letting her down.
Takes charge of the emergency situation by instructing Frank to secure a safe location for Angela and himself, demonstrating quick situational assessment and planning.

Acknowledges the gravity of the situation, hesitates before deciding to take the wounded Frechette to a hospital despite the associated risks, showing measured judgment and willingness to act under pressure.
Comforts Angela with calm reassurance despite the trauma and chaos, maintaining his composure to support others emotionally.
Expresses doubt and apology to Angela, admitting he 'let her down,' which could indicate self-blame or a perceived lack of control over the situation.
Wisely keeps his mouth shut when questioned by Bishop and Holt.
Shows confusion or memory lapse about the whereabouts of his partner Frank and Angela, shaking his head and stonewalling.
Asks how long he has been brought in, indicating some disorientation or lack of situational awareness.
Admits to shooting Chuck when pressed, showing some acceptance of reality or straightforwardness.
Covers his mouth to avoid lip readers noticing his instructions, showing situational awareness.
Calmly coaches Dr. Klein to memorize a complex passcode under pressure.
Demonstrates persuasive skills by convincing reluctant Dr. Klein to assist.
Recognizes the urgency of the situation involving Angela and acts decisively.
Lies back exhausted but stays hopeful after delegating the task, showing self-awareness of limits.
Attempts to call for help and gets no response in the hospital room.
Uses resourcefulness by finding a hidden handcuff key and frees himself quietly.
Carefully checks on his physical condition after escaping confinement.
Seeks out Heather despite difficult circumstances; shows vulnerability and emotional pain openly.
Is visibly numbed and broken by emotional news, allowing himself to be comforted by Heather.
Nods to co-worker and flings cigarette away before returning to work.
Engages slack customer with friendly, casual conversation, showing some attentiveness and light humor.
Observes Angela silently and makes accurate guesses about personal details, displaying a somewhat intrusive attentiveness.
Knocks off twenty percent from the carpet price if paid in cash.
Engages in light, friendly banter with customers (Slacker and Angela), showing casual interest.
Smirks when Angela dips into her purse, a subtle sign of friendly amusement or camaraderie.
Lights Angela's cigarette, an act of friendly consideration and connection.
Smiles at Kathy, shares groceries with her, receives and reciprocates affection, responds to her whispers with an increased smile and gentle touch on her belly.
Leaves the house briefly without engaging with anyone else, focuses on his own activities like going to the supermarket alone.
Purchases groceries and manages routine tasks such as driving home and unlocking his door without issue.
Demonstrates calm and gentle interpersonal behavior with Kathy, indicating emotional intelligence but not directly related to competence in skill or task performance.
Passively observes surroundings (car creaking away, looks up at the sun) but does not take any notable action to change or affect his environment.
